external_homepage: GetMp3 is a opensource and crossplatform application, for download mp3 songs from a title or an youtube url. It is very rapid, normally for download a song it takes about 20 seconds, and it uses differents conversion systems. It is written in python so you can run it everywhere with python installed but there are binaries for Windows and Mac that don't require any installation.
name: GetMp3
short_description: GetMp3 is a opensource and crossplatform application, for download mp3 songs from a title or an youtube url. It is very rapid, normally for download a song it takes about 20 seconds, and it uses differents conversion systems. It is written in python so you can run it everywhere with python installed but there are binaries for Windows and Mac that don't require any installation.
summary: GetMp3 is a console app for download mp3 songs written in python
